title: CS Utopia - Challenge - introduction to Computer Science.

body.raw:
## Introduction

This is the first year Univerity projected built in a team of 4 people. We were challenged to go though a lot of sessions with client and build:

- Data Models
- Figma UX/UI designs
- Backend using Strapi Headless CMS
- Frontend using NextJS and MUI
- Deploy on Railway

<MdxImage
  src="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fcs-utopia.png"
  width={800}
  height={500}
  className="mx-auto mt-5 mb-4"
/>

## About

Our esteemed client was none other than our university itself. Recognizing the need for a platform to assist post-school students in selecting their desired specialties, we embarked on a brainstorming journey. The outcome? CS Utopiaâ€”a platform designed to ignite interest in computer science courses among students.

The platform offers interactive quizzes and essential learning materials covering a myriad of computer science topics. From algorithms to data structures, users can engage with dynamic content to deepen their understanding and enhance their learning journey.

## Technologies

> Technologies we used were:
>
> - Nextjs
> - typescript
> - Material ui
> - Strapi
